Monster.Name: Girallon
Monster.Description: A girallon looks like an oversized, four-armed ape with gray skin and white fur. Although they are adept climbers, these half-ton creatures shy away from scaling trees that can't support their bulk. Instead, they stalk the forest floor, lurk in narrow ravines or shallow caves, or hide in ruined sites while waiting for prey to come near.

MonsterTrait.Name: Aggressive
MonsterTrait.Text: As a bonus action, the girallon can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The girallon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The girallon makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft, one creature. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit. reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) slashing damage.
